comment: A blank example sequence diagram with 3 actors and no calls! However it does define ".params" object
to give a default looks and feel for comment boxes. There is also Tag that provides a shortcut to colour
and font markup into a comment string. For example, the following text is marked up with the <code> tag:
Note that a parameter defined tag just inserts the alias markup into the specific string of text, and will
remain in force in that string until otherwise changed. So <code><code> here will run until the end of the line.
But <code> and </code> markup is enclosed to open and close markup parts of the string.
